Montauk Climate Corp























































































HomeOur ApproachOur TeamOur Work

Get in Touch














We create companies that flourish during a time of electrification transition



We spend our time imagining, launching and growing companies that will succeed and prosper in this future.








Our beliefs


We are focused founders and operators that move with deliberate speed to bring a sustainable future closer to today, every day. 


























A Trustworthy Springboard
Our team of experienced founders are energized by working with other world-class founders to build companies of significance.
























Focus on Innovation
Tomorrow’s solutions require innovation today. We enjoy working with the best and brightest to create innovative solutions that will thrive in a world focused on sustainability.



















Sustainability-Driven Outperformance
Businesses with a sustainability focus are poised to generate the majority of venture returns over the next two decades. Our time is dedicated to delivering superior returns within the climate innovation economy. 





















Regulatory Momentum
Global regulatory and tax incentives are set to propel the exponential growth of climate technologies and electrification. We will harness this regulatory momentum broadly.



















Expertise Matters
We are focused on developing profitable businesses that generate impact and significance. We give our founders the access and resources necessary to work with the smartest minds within climate and energy.



















Clever Determination
We value working smarter and harder. Company building requires grit and determination. Clever problem solving and having the right tools for the job are critical to delivering a successful mission.


























A Trustworthy Springboard
Our team of experienced founders are energized by working with other world-class founders to build companies of significance.
























Focus on Innovation
Tomorrow’s solutions require innovation today. We enjoy working with the best and brightest to create innovative solutions that will thrive in a world focused on sustainability.





















Sustainability-Driven Outperformance
Businesses with a sustainability focus are poised to generate the majority of venture returns over the next two decades. Our time is dedicated to delivering superior returns within the climate innovation economy. 



















Regulatory Momentum
Global regulatory and tax incentives are set to propel the exponential growth of climate technologies and electrification. We will harness this regulatory momentum broadly.





















Expertise Matters
We are focused on developing profitable businesses that generate impact and significance. We give our founders the access and resources necessary to work with the smartest minds within climate and energy.



















Clever Determination
We value working smarter and harder. Company building requires grit and determination. Clever problem solving and having the right tools for the job are critical to delivering a successful mission.








Areas of Focus



Decarbonization
New technology and infrastructure are necessary to balance the increasing demand for electricity as carbon combustion is taken out of the system. We will help build technologies that help manage that decarbonization demand.



Providing Predictability & Relief
A system more reliant on electricity, but with increasing power outages creates a significant near-term headwind to decarbonization. Our businesses seek to reduce that volatility so businesses and consumers can trust the decarbonization era.



Metrics & Measurement
Measuring, managing, reducing and reporting carbon emissions has reached a tipping point of necessity and scale. Each of our businesses will contribute materially to the management of climate externalities for society. 



Mobility
Mobility needs are changing rapidly in a future of electrification and autonomy.



Adaptation
In the coming decades, capital flows or climate will strand assets suddenly. Our companies will help along adaptation by providing resilience planning, financial intermediation, and systems hardening.



Sustainability
Many industries will revolutionize their business model for a circular and sustainable future













What we invest in





“Sustainability is history’s biggest investment opportunity.”
Al Gore






Key Market Verticals



















Energy Systems

















Financial Enablement



















Workforce Development






















Electrification



















Power Consistency & Quality

















Energy Equity

Our Approach – Montauk Climate Corp
























































































HomeOur ApproachOur TeamOur Work

Get in Touch












Our Building Approach

At Montauk Climate, we build companies that make a meaningful impact. We thrive on collaborating with high-integrity founders who share our passion for climate. Together, we optimize capital, talent, and ideas to allow success to flourish.











01






02






03






04










Deep Subject Matter Expertise
Partners with the foremost experts on nearly any topic within energy and climate.





Extensive Operational Expertise
Operating backgrounds at every stage of company cycle





Resources on Demand
Highly networked and connected to both potential operating and financing partners





Relationships
Both internal and external resources available for every step of the Founders’ journey







Founder-centric,ClimateTech Focus


We are looking to collaborate with visionary founders committed to building high-impact, scalable companies within the climate tech space. We can provide the focused-resources for success as we work to solve the planetary climate problem together. 





The Montauk Climate Corp Model








Conceive

From Idea to Vision

We work with founders from day one to conceive, research, and validate world-changing ideas.








Incubate
Nurturing Innovation
Once we deeply understand the idea, we provide founders with the guidance and network to build the best possible solution.








Launch
Taking Flight
We surround founders with a team of experts to bring the concept to market efficiently.








Scale
Accelerating Impact
We provide teams ongoing support to enable companies to grow rapidly and maximize impact.

Learn More






The opportunity is massive, the need even bigger




$3T
The global renewable energy market is projected to reach over $3 trillion by 2030, representing a significant growth opportunity for sustainable technology companies.


15%
Clean energy investments have been growing at an annual rate of approximately 15%, indicating strong investor interest and a favorable funding environment for climate-focused startups.


30M
The renewable energy sector is expected to create millions of jobs globally, with estimates suggesting that over 30 million jobs could be generated by 2030, further highlighting economic potential for the industry.

Our Team – Montauk Climate Corp
























































































HomeOur ApproachOur TeamOur Work

Get in Touch












World class operators and deep domain experts at every level








Management Team
Partners
Advisors





Philip Krim,Co-Founder & CEO
Philip is the Co-Founder and CEO at Montauk Climate. Before Montauk Climate, Philip was the CEO of Casper Mattress and a venture capital investor.

Meet Philip




Sharo Atmeh,Co-Founder & COO

Sharo is Chief Operating Officer at Montauk Climate. Prior to Montauk, Sharo spent a decade building out a ClimateTech investing platform at one of the world’s largest hedge funds.


Meet Sharo




Mahsa Nami
Mahsa is a Principal at Montauk Climate. Prior to Montauk, Mahsa was an investor at Sidewalk Infrastructure Partners and an Engagement Manager at McKinsey & Company.

Meet Mahsa




Gusty Clarke
Gusty is a Principal at Montauk Climate. Prior to Montauk, Gusty helped build and run Riverstone Ventures and ran the fundraising program at The Montana Land Reliance, the largest working lands conservation group in the nation.

Meet Gusty






Evan Caron,Co-Founder & CIO
Evan is the Co-Founder and Chief Investment Officer at Montauk Climate. Evan was previously Head of Venture Investments at Riverstone Private equity, a $40 Billion+ energy investment and infrastructure firm.

Meet Evan




Kirk Hourdajian,       Partner
Kirk is a Partner and Head of Venture at Montauk.  Prior to Montauk, Kirk worked on climate and impact investing at Vista Equity Partners, TPG, The Rise Fund, PwC and Environmental Defense Fund.  

Meet Kirk




Tatiana Grossman
Tatiana Grossman is Partner at Montauk Climate. Prior to joining Montauk, she was Founder and CEO of a climate tech company in the Agriculture Technology space.

Meet Tatiana

Our Work – Montauk Climate Corp
























































































HomeOur ApproachOur TeamOur Work

Get in Touch











We champion founders with world-changing ideas






The edge we provide founders for success




01


Expert Community


Climate markets are in their very early stages, creating gaps between scientific knowledge and operator experience. We help bridge that gap by uniting the world’s foremost operators with scientists, and providing the capital for success.





02


Resources


Gather the resources necessary to win as quickly as possible for your company. We can match products with beta customers, solutions with regulators, and scientists with business experts to harness your ideas.





03


Speed


We are running out of time to meet our climate goals. Speed is a critical competitive advantage to match a product with its market.





04


Persistence


Think big, act small. Establish a north star. Make daily progress.  We are there for you every step of the way.








Some examples of our work









Haven Energy is accelerating the adoption of home battery systems

Read More
















ElectronX will be launching a CFTC regulated Exchange for trading electricity derivatives

Read More
